main_tasks:
As a member of a dynamic development team, you’ll actively be involved in designing and developing embedded software for or next generation Mobile and Optical Transport products.
•	Work together with multidisciplinary teams to define new product requirements.
•	Participate in high level system architecture design.
•	Perform work item breakdowns and provide input to project scheduling via effort estimates.
•	Document and review requirements and collaborate on designs with peers and stake holders.
•	Develop and maintain embedded software applications.
•	Document, review and execute unit test cases for embedded software applications.
•	Provide support throughout the product verification cycle.
•	Participate in code inspections.
•	Provide guidance to and share technical expertise with more junior members of the software team.
requirements:
•	A bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering or Computer Science.
•	5+ years of experience designing and developing embedded software.
•	Distributed real-time, multi-threaded application development.
•	Superior design and coding (C/C++) skills.
•	In depth knowledge of embedded operating systems.
•	Experience with debugging in an embedded environment.
•	Sound technical judgment.
•	Team player with excellent written and verbal communication skills.
•	Highly productive and self-motivated.
•	Desire for continual learning.
jd:
DZS (Nasdaq:DZSI) is headquarter in Plano, Texas and is an innovator and market-leader in intelligent, packet-based mobile transport and broadband access converged edge solutions for the emerging 5G and 10Gig fiber-to-the-premises upgrade cycle. DZS has a differentiated platforms and software portfolio that resulted in a transformational 2021 and we are excited about are on track in 2022 to elevate to new heights.  As a DZS employee, you will be encouraged to achieve the extraordinary and continuously challenge traditional ways of doing things. The leadership team is dedicated and focused on People, Innovation, Growth and Operational Excellence. We are always looking for top talent to join our team! Is that you? Here you will have an outstanding opportunity and chance to use your imagination and tenacity to push the boundaries of what is possible.


주요업무
As a member of a dynamic development team, you’ll actively be involved in designing and developing embedded software for or next generation Mobile and Optical Transport products.
•	Work together with multidisciplinary teams to define new product requirements.
•	Participate in high level system architecture design.
•	Perform work item breakdowns and provide input to project scheduling via effort estimates.
•	Document and review requirements and collaborate on designs with peers and stake holders.
•	Develop and maintain embedded software applications.
•	Document, review and execute unit test cases for embedded software applications.
•	Provide support throughout the product verification cycle.
•	Participate in code inspections.
•	Provide guidance to and share technical expertise with more junior members of the software team.

자격요건
•	A bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering or Computer Science.
•	5+ years of experience designing and developing embedded software.
•	Distributed real-time, multi-threaded application development.
•	Superior design and coding (C/C++) skills.
•	In depth knowledge of embedded operating systems.
•	Experience with debugging in an embedded environment.
•	Sound technical judgment.
•	Team player with excellent written and verbal communication skills.
•	Highly productive and self-motivated.
•	Desire for continual learning.

우대사항
•	Knowledge of optical telecommunications (DWDM/OTN/SONET/Ethernet).
•	Embedded Linux application development.
•	Experience with interfacing to embedded devices via interfaces such as I2C, SPI, RS-232.
•	Knowledge of various embedded system user interfaces (NETCONF/SNMP/TL1/Telnet/SSH/Serial CLI).
•	Automation (TCL/Expect/Python).
